description.value:
The shaman causes a creature within 30 feet to become slightly magnetic until the end of the shaman’s next turn. Whenever the creature is attacked with a melee or ranged weapon constructed primarily of metal, it takes a –2 penalty to AC.

At 8th and 16th levels, the penalty increases by –2 and the duration extends by 1 round.

Once affected, the creature cannot be the target of this hex again for 24 hours.
